依据身份证和手机号，获取常用的变量信息

作者：liyingkun

时间：2017-10-26

\chapter{Example}
\label{\detokenize{index:example}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n+nn}{pandas} \PYG{k+kn}{as} \PYG{n+nn}{pd}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 1.含有idno和mobile列的数据集}
\PYG{n}{df} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{read\PYGZus{}csv}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{r\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{FILE\PYGZus{}PATH}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 其中含有idno  mobile列}
\PYG{n}{f\PYGZus{}Get\PYGZus{}idno\PYGZus{}Info}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{df}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{head}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 获取身份证相关的地址信息和年龄性别信息}
\PYG{n}{f\PYGZus{}Get\PYGZus{}mobile\PYGZus{}Info}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{df}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{head}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 获取手机号码相关的信息}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 2.列名不为idno或mobile}
\PYG{n}{df} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{read\PYGZus{}csv}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{r\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{FILE\PYGZus{}PATH}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 其中不含有idno  mobile列 其代表身份证的列名为id\PYGZus{}no 代码手机号的为phone}
\PYG{n}{f\PYGZus{}Get\PYGZus{}idno\PYGZus{}Info}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{df}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{id\PYGZus{}no}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{head}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 获取身份证相关的地址信息和年龄性别信息}
\PYG{n}{f\PYGZus{}Get\PYGZus{}mobile\PYGZus{}Info}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{df}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{phone}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{head}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{100}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} 获取手机号码相关的信息}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{}匹配完后 需要和原数据集merge}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
